column3: colorful & energetic setting. The staff were all so perky! However
column4: it took another hour to receive our orders. At the halfway mark
column5: our waitress gifted us a plate of delicious
column7: a scoop of (?) butter & (?) syrup. LOL as vibrant as the chick is who brought this out - she did such a poor job describing the dish. But we didn't care
